/download.description: Downloads Share (also known as the sickchill monitor folder). UID:GID specified later must have full access.
/download.label: Download [e.g. sickchill-downloads]

/config.description: Configuration storage. UID:GID specified later must have full access.
/config.label: Config [e.g. sickchill-config]

/tv.description: Share for shows (also known as parent folder). Shares can be added later. UID:GID specified later must have full access.
/tv.label: TV [e.g. sickchill-shows]

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run SickChill under. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It (or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID

SickChill.description:
Automatic Video Library Manager for TV Shows.

Based on a custom OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
SickChill.more_info:
Automatic Video Library Manager for TV Shows. It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows, and when they are posted it does its magic.

Help and documentation
